job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field

jd: Hello............Greetings,This is Manasa from ITech US Inc. I've shared below the details of the position with one of our clients and I would like to know if you are interested or can recommend someone interested in this job. Python Developer Zulu, IN (Onsite from day 1) 12+ Months contract Looking for Locals and H1B consultants from third-party vendors Need PP no along with submission Skills: Python Education: At least a bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field is required If you’re Interested, please share your updated resume along with below details. Consultant Full Name Current location Contact Number Work Authorization Willing to work onsite LinkedIn Technology Thanks & Regards Manasa Salla Sr Technical Recruiter iTech US, Inc manasa.s@itechus.net LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/manasa-salla-0836711a8
